description: Tired of not being able to talk on the phone while charging? Need an extra few feet to reach your computer for syncing? The XTG Technology USB extension cable is ideal for giving you that extra length you crave. It's sleek white finish and high quality connectors are made for any USB cable including iPod, iPhone and all other smart phone and USB powered devices.
title: USB Extension Cable (3.5ft Long) - Doubles the Length When Connected to Your Existing iPhone or iPod Cable - Ideal for Any Device That Uses, Charges or Syncs Using USB- XTG Technology
